collections.name: Greek Alphabet
collections.description: Classical Greek letters with lowercase, uppercase, and names.

collections.name: Linguistic Term Kanji Supplement
collections.description: Popular vocabulary featuring kanji from Japanese linguistic terminology (with recursive component entries)

collections.name: Linguistic Terms
collections.description: Terminology for Japanese phonetics, writing systems, and grammar

collections.name: Japanese N5 Kanji
collections.description: Single-kanji basics for N5. Each entry should be a single kanji, with its most basic kun'yomi (native Japanese reading) or on'yomi (Sino-Japanese reading). Do not include okurigana or full verb forms (e.g., use 'たべ' or 'しょく' for 食, not 'たべる').

collections.name: Pokemon name-root & type tokens (Japanese)
collections.description: Canonical kanji and katakana tokens used as Pokémon type labels and name roots (used by the pokemon collection).

collections.name: Japanese N5 Sentences
collections.description: Common sentences that include kanji from the N5 kanji list.

collections.name: Common Katakana Nouns (English-Origin Only) Top 100 pt1
collections.description: High-frequency katakana nouns in Japanese that are specifically loanwords from English (excluding Portuguese, French, Italian, etc.).

collections.description: High-frequency katakana nouns in Japanese that are specifically loanwords from English (excluding Portuguese, French, Italian, etc.).

collections.name: Japanese Compound Verbs — godan — compositional
collections.description: Productive compound verbs built transparently from parts; final element is godan.

collections.name: Japanese Compound Verbs — godan — grammaticalized
collections.description: Common compounds where the final godan element is grammaticalized (mutual/auxiliary-like).

collections.name: Japanese Compound Verbs — godan — hybrid
collections.description: Frequent hybrid compound verbs (partly productive, partly conventionalized); final element is godan.

collections.name: Japanese Compound Verbs — godan — lexical
collections.description: Curated frequent lexicalized compound verbs whose final element is godan.

collections.name: Japanese Compound Verbs — ichidan — compositional
collections.description: Productive ichidan compound verbs built transparently from parts; final element is ichidan.

collections.name: Japanese Compound Verbs — ichidan — grammaticalized
collections.description: Ichidan compounds where the final element is grammaticalized (auxiliary-like or polite/functional uses).

collections.name: GU-Ending Godan Verbs (Top 10)
collections.description: 10 high-usage Japanese godan verbs ending in ぐ (gu).

collections.name: GU-Ending Godan Verbs (Next 10)
collections.description: 10 additional Japanese godan verbs ending in ぐ (gu).

collections.name: KU-Ending Godan Verbs (Top 10)
collections.description: 10 high-usage Japanese godan verbs ending in く (ku).

collections.name: KU-Ending Godan Verbs (Next 10)
collections.description: 10 additional Japanese godan verbs ending in く (ku).

collections.name: MU-Ending Godan Verbs (High Frequency)
collections.description: 10 high-frequency Japanese godan verbs ending in む (mu).

collections.name: MU-Ending Godan Verbs (Low Frequency)
collections.description: 10 lower-frequency Japanese godan verbs ending in む (mu).

collections.name: MU-Ending Godan Verbs (Medium Frequency)
collections.description: 10 medium-frequency Japanese godan verbs ending in む (mu).
